keys: propagación de la onda de radio

          <title>
            <string language="en">Frequency responses of tuning circuits</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Frequenzgänge der justierenstromkreise</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réponses en fr3quence des circuits d'accord</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Respostas de freqüência de circuitos ajustando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risposte di frequenza dei circuiti di sintonia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απαντήσεις συχνότητας του συντονισμού των κυκλωμάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Respuestas de frecuencia de circuitos que templan</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This graph shows the frequency response curves of two different tuning circuits superimposed on the multi-carrier signal received by the aerial.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">am transmissions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radio waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">aerial signal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">frequency response curves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radio receiver</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radio wave propagation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tuning circuits</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt die Frequenzgangkurven von 
zwei unterschiedlichen justierenstromkreisen, die auf dem 
Multifördermaschine Signal gelegt werden, das durch die Antenne 
empfangen wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce graphique montre les courbes de réponse en 
fr3quence de deux circuits d'accord différents superposés au signal 
de multi-porteur reçu par l'antenne.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este gráfico mostra as curvas de resposta da 
freqüência de dois circuitos ajustando diferentes sobrepostos no 
sinal do multi-portador recebido pela antena.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo grafico mostra le curve di reazione di 
frequenza di due circuiti di sintonia differenti sovrapposti sul 
segnale dell'multi-elemento portante ricevuto dall'antenna.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η γραφική παράσταση εμφανίζει καμπύλες 
απάντησης συχνότητας δύο διαφορετικών συντονίζοντας κυκλωμάτων 
που επιβάλλονται στο σήμα πολυ-μεταφορέων που παραλαμβάνεται από 
την κεραία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este gráfico muestra las curvas de respuesta de 
frecuencia de dos diversos circuitos que templan sobrepuestos en la 
señal del multi-portador recibida por la antena.</string>
          </description>
